channel.title: Gurugram News, Latest Gurugram News, Gurugram News Today and Headlines | Hindustan Times
channel.description: Gurugram News - Find latest Gurugram news and Headlines based from Gurgaon City. Also check out latest news belongs to Gurugram crime, Gurgaon education news, Gurugram real estate, Gurugram politics and more at Hindustan Times.

image.title: Gurugram News, Latest Gurugram News, Gurugram News Today and Headlines | Hindustan Times

item.title: Bank employee in Gurugram duped of ₹3 lakh by fraudster posing as friend on WhatsApp
item.description: The woman, a resident of Sector 43 of Gurugram, said she received a WhatsApp call Thursday from a number which had the display picture of her friend.

item.title: MCG to continue garbage dumping at Bandhwari landfill
item.description: Gurugram dumps around 100 tonnes of garbage at the Bandhwari landfill daily. At present, the landfill has around 2.5 million tonnes of waste and is estimated to be 38m tall, making it one of the largest dump sites in north India. The leachate from the landfill is also aversely impacting the ecologically sensitive Aravallis

item.title: Surajkund Crafts Mela gets underway in Faridabad
item.description: The 36th edition of the Surajkund International Crafts Mela, showcasing the cultural fabric of the country, opened to public in Faridabad on Friday

item.title: Ggm admin takes steps to ensure adequate infra before G20 meet
item.description: Apart from the heritage transport museum, camera museum in Sector 29 and Sultanpur bird sanctuary are places where the delegates from G20 countries are likely to visit

item.title: Private Gurugram school gets threat, extortion texts, police lodge complaint
item.description: According to the complaint filed by Raju Rajbhar, operator of a private school in Sector 9 A area, a threat message was received on January 28 on the mobile number of the reception of the school

item.title: Gurugram man duped of ₹50k in WhatsApp fraud, couple held
item.description: The couple used to copy people’s photos from various social sites, put it as their WhatsApp display picture, and then used to send messages to the same person’s friends or relatives, said police.

item.title: Illegal path lab owner arrested from Manesar
item.description: Police said that the suspect, Amarjeet Kumar, was carrying out various tests such as AIDS, Hepatitis-C, rapid antigen for Covid-19 without a license, at the laboratory in Naharpur.

item.title: 36th Surajkund International Crafts Mela: Now, book spot at fest parking
item.description: The new parking facility will make use of a FASTag-enabled technology for easy payments and visitors will be able to use the Park+ app to discover, book and prepay for a spot at government-approved parking areas near the festival

item.title: Man hit while crossing road, run over by multiple vehicles on NH-48
item.description: By the time the police were alerted and reached the spot, the body was mutilated beyond recognition and parts were scattered over at least a 100m radius on the Delhi-Jaipur carriageway

item.title: Class 11 student raped, threatened over sensitive photos in Gurugram
item.description: According to the complaint filed by the mother, her daughter, a student of Class 11, had befriended a man named Raj Diwedi, from Uttar Pradesh, last year on a social media platform

item.title: Gurugram civic body rejigs registration of pets, licence now for 3 years
item.description: MCG said it has started the process to streamline pet registration and has already given licences to owners of 750 pets, said officials
